title: [NFC][OpenMP] Move the default declare mapper name suffix to OMPConstants.h
body: This patch moves the default declare mapper name suffix ".omp.default.mapper" to the OMPConstants.h file to be used everywhere for lowering.
commits:
[NFC][OpenMP] Move the default declare mapper name suffix to OMPConstants.h

This patch moves the default declare mapper name suffix ".omp.default.mapper" to the OMPConstants.h file to be used everywhere for lowering.
